location.zh-cn: 天津市河西区西园道6号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国天津市的省级国家监察机关，与中国共产党天津市纪律检查委员会合署办公。
description.en: The provincial-level state supervisory organ of Tianjin, People's Republic of China, which works jointly with the Tianjin Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任天津市监察委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家监察机关。
description.en: The highest state supervisory organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 天津市的国家权力机关。
description.en: The state power organ of Tianjin.

nodes.id: 天津市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 天津市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Tianjin Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 天津市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Tianjin Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党天津市纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市纪律检查委员会
en: Tianjin Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The discipline inspection body of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国监察法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国监察法
en: Supervision Law of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于国家监察工作的基本法律。
description.en: The basic law of the People's Republic of China concerning state supervision work.

description.zh-cn: 关于天津市机构改革的方案文件。
description.en: The plan document regarding institutional reform in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 陈辐宽担任天津市监察委员会主任。
description.en: Chen Fukuan serves as the Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 安长海担任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: An Changhai serves as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 薛广庆担任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Xue Guangqing serves as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 周承光担任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Zhou Chengguang serves as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 高震担任天津市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Gao Zhen serves as a Deputy Director of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会是天津市监察委员会的业务上级机构。
description.en: The National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China is the operational superior of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 天津市人民代表大会是天津市监察委员会的组织上级机构。
description.en: The Tianjin Municipal People's Congress is the organizational superior of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

relationships.target: 天津市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 天津市人民代表大会常务委员会是天津市监察委员会的组织上级机构。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the Tianjin Municipal People's Congress is the organizational superior of the Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党天津市纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 天津市监察委员会与中国共产党天津市纪律检查委员会合署办公。
description.en: The Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission works jointly with the Tianjin Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国监察法

description.zh-cn: 天津市监察委员会依据《中华人民共和国监察法》组建。
description.en: The Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission was established in accordance with the Supervision Law of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 天津市监察委员会依据《天津市机构改革方案》组建。
description.en: The Tianjin Municipal Supervisory Commission was established in accordance with the Tianjin Municipal Institutional Reform Plan.
